title: An example of skill expression... and then a video not so much showing anything
body:
So this is a video of skill expression. Morde heals to deny the darius reset. Then he kites over to the raptors for heals and shields, while controlling dragon seamlessly. Btw the first damage is at 50% speed... so if you want to see how fast that really happened pump it up to 2x. 
https://youtu.be/cWFX2_yryp0

And this is crap, because damage needs a nerf. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSpaXH_3vpg

Seriously we need to nerf damage already. This is Bull shit.

So you are saying seamlessly controlling a ghost with r clicks, not missing any W’s for healing, kiting a kassadin after a w heal that forces Darius to miss an ultimate reset isn’t skill expression? 

I call bs. Not denying the Darius ulti would have been gg we lose because he could have just nuked the whole team. Not knowing how to position to get Morse’s double heal on raptors would have been gg I lose. Not getting Mordes E to generate shield at the right time would have killed him. 

Morde had to manage positioning, cdrs, and manage a clone that is notorious for not listening. I’d really like to see the micro on that Zoe Q ohh wait there was none.

Just because you don’t know what actual skill expression looks like doesn’t mean it wasn’t there.

Skill expression is not auto killing the enemy.

morde has to do manage positioning _a thing that adcarries always do and get punished  harder if they fail on it_  and know how to play the champion and spamming abilities when their useable and off cooldown

Adc's don't get punished as hard for it, because they have a huge range advantage from the get go. 

Did you know morde has 25 base armor, while draven has 35... 

Shit like that is ridiculous. He also has one of the lowest base healths in the game. He also has a lower base MS, which means that its harder to re-position with morde. Lets be honest all of those micro movements take alot of work.
